name: Castform

passive.name: Forecast
passive.effect: When you attach an Energy to Castform, you may search your deck for another card named Castform, replace it with this one, and shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Weather Vane
attacks.effect: Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal an Fire, Ice, Rock, or Water Energy. Draw that card, and shuffle the others back into your deck.

flavor: Castform are pernicious creatures that change with the weather.
